segments.text: I see the woman is drying dishes, she seems so focused on her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just pouring over the edge of the sink, it's such a mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is being so daring, climbing up on that stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just waiting for her cookie, she seems so patient.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see the garden outside, it's so peaceful and calm.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kitchen is in such disarray, it's a shame.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks like it's about to tip over, someone should help that boy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just standing in the puddle, she must be so focused on drying that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The dishes are stacked neatly, at least someone has been keeping things tidy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the woman will notice the children taking cookies soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookie jar is almost full, they must have baked a lot of cookies recently.
segments.speaker: PAR
